labels.nostreetviewimageavailablemsg:
No Street View Image Available
or you have not yet dragged the Google® Street View man
onto the map to set your location.
labels.instructions: Drag the Google® Street View man onto the street you want to see a panorama for. You can also drag the street view man around on the map once he has been placed.
labels.operamsg: Because you are using Opera as your web browser you may need to perform the following steps
labels.popupblockermsg: This widget uses a popup window to show Google Street View panoramas. You need to enable popups in your browser.
